item.description:
Another good rock n' roll group...check'm out at www.phoenixrocks.net, playing Saturday at Michael's in Tyngsboro.  Convenient to both NH and Merrimack Valley, this club has been renovated, with nice big dance floor, and the food is pretty good too ;)

Meet at 7:30 for dinner, (please put in your reply if you'll be there for dinner) and to avoid the $5 cover charge that starts at 8pm.  Band goes on at 9-9:30, so let's boogie on this warm and wonderful Memorial Day weekend.

I'll reserve a couple tables, but get there as early as possible, I'm told the place is jumpin' ;)

I'll be happy to introduce you, if you get there before the band starts, otherwise, you know where you can find me...

Have a Happy and Safe Memorial Day weekend!

susan

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Rock with Phoenix at Michael's in Tyngsboro
